response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to you, estimated at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000, a savings of $100,000 compared to its market value. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure that you have the chance to own this masterpiece at a highly favorable rate. I trust that you will find this proposition compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
